title: Leaver buster issue
body: I was placed in low priority since the preseason started and slowly earned a 20 minutes queue time and every time I get a hiccup or issue I'm back in it. Now I lost internet for a second and got leaver(remake) just as I was loading in and back into the 20 minute grind again. Rito, I sent like 99 bugsplat reports and a leaver buster removal ain't 1.

replies.body: did my five games and played two more games and my client crashed mid game. I didn't even get a bugsplat message and now I'm stuck again waiting 20mins

yes, even after I updated my drivers and still incurred issues with bugsplats and random ping spikes of 2k and fps drops to 06 still. today it was just as bad and the random d/cs and fps dropped(screen freezes) without showing  fps or ping dips. Though the reconnect issue showed up more.
So just to confirm, you've experienced many bugsplats over the last few weeks and this has caused Leaverbuster penalties?

I have had the same issue with a DirectX issue. This is causing me to be unable to play the game for not only the game issue, but the Leaver Buster issue as well when I can finally get back into the client.
